Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.name: noUser
Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.abstract: There is no user associated to perform the requested action.

Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.name: invalidUpdate
Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.abstract: The update cannot be performed because of invalid data.

Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.name: alreadyLoggedIn
Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.abstract: There is already another user logged-in.

Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.name: invalidEmail
Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.abstract: The provided email is not valid.

Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.name: migrationRequired(_:)
Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.abstract: The action would require to migrate the current user data to a new account.

Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.name: alreadyAnonymous
Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.abstract: The requested action cannot be performed because there is already an anonymous user logged-in.

Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.name: userNotFound
Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.abstract: The specified user cannot be found.

Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.name: userDisabled
Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.abstract: The specified user is disabled.

Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.name: expiredToken
Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.abstract: The user token has expired.

Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.name: wrongPassword
Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.abstract: The specified password is invalid.

Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.name: invalidCredential
Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.abstract: The specified credential is either expired or invalid.

Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.name: emailAlreadyInUse
Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.abstract: The specified email is already in use in another account.

Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.name: weakPassword(_:)
Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.abstract: The specified password does not satisfy the basic security requirements.

Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.name: wrongUser
Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.abstract: The requested action would target a different user than the one currently signed-in.

Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.name: authenticationConfirmationRequired
Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.abstract: The requested action requires a recent call to self.confirmAuthentication(email:password:) or one of the related calls for other providers.

Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.name: providerAlreadyLinked
Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.abstract: The specified provider is already linked with this user.

Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.name: providerNotLinked
Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.abstract: The specified provider is not linked with this user.

Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.name: networkError
Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.abstract: An error occurred while reaching Firebase servers.

Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.name: configurationError
Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.abstract: The requested operation is not enabled in Firebase Console.

Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.name: invalidConfiguration
Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.abstract: The provided Firebase configuration is invalid.

Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.name: keychainError(_:)
Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.abstract: An error occurred while attempting to access the keychain.

Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.name: unknown(_:)
Enums/UserError.html#/s:10RxFireAuth9Use.abstract: An unknown error has occurred.
